HTTP
Class HTTPRequest

java.lang.Object
  HTTP.HTTPRequest

public class HTTPRequest
extends java.lang.Object

Represents an HTTP request. More implementation is needed on the parsing end of this to get this properly processing POST requests because data in the content area of the request would then need to be processed.
